title: Profesia.sk Scraper
description: Configure the Profesia.sk Scraper. NOTE: Either "Dataset type" or "Start URLs" must be given.

datasetType.title: Dataset type
datasetType.description: Use this option if you want to scrape whole dataset, not just specific URLs. Choose what kind of data you want to extract - job offers, list of companies, list of industries, ... This option is ignored if 'startUrls' is given

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Select specific URLs to scrape. This option takes precedence over the 'dataset type' input. If the URL is a listing page or a company page, all entries of that list are extracted. If the URL is a company page, only that page is extracted

jobOfferDetailed.title: Detailed
jobOfferDetailed.description: If checked, the scraper will obtain more detailed info for job offers by visit the details page of each job offer to extract data. If un-checked, only the data from the listing page is extracted. For details, please refer to http://apify.com/store/jurooravec/profesia-sk-scraper#output
jobOfferDetailed.groupDescription: These filters are applied ONLY when 'Dataset type' is set to 'Job offers' (Optional)

jobOfferFilterQuery.title: Search query (full-text search)
jobOfferFilterQuery.description: If given, only entries matching the query will be retrieved (full-text search)

jobOfferFilterMaxCount.title: Max number of results
jobOfferFilterMaxCount.description: If set, only up to this number of entries will be extracted. The actual number of entries might higher than this due to multiple pages being scraped at the same time.

jobOfferFilterMinSalaryValue.title: Min salary
jobOfferFilterMinSalaryValue.description: If set, only entries offering this much or more will be extracted

jobOfferFilterMinSalaryPeriod.title: Min salary per hour/month
jobOfferFilterMinSalaryPeriod.description: Choose if the minimum salary is in per hour or per month format

jobOfferFilterEmploymentType.title: Type of employment
jobOfferFilterEmploymentType.description: If set, only entries with this employment filter will be extracted

jobOfferFilterRemoteWorkType.title: Remote vs On-site
jobOfferFilterRemoteWorkType.description: If set, only entries with this type of remote work filter will be extracted

jobOfferFilterLastNDays.title: Last N days
jobOfferFilterLastNDays.description: If set, only entries this much days old will be extracted. E.g. 7 = 1 week old, 31 = 1 month old, ...

jobOfferCountOnly.title: Count the matched job offers
jobOfferCountOnly.description: If checked, no data is extracted. Instead, the count of matched job offers is printed in the log.
jobOfferCountOnly.groupDescription: Use these to verify that your custom startUrls are correct
